title: Bloomberg Markets: IPhone X Shipments to Be Half of Forecast
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: IPhone X Shipments to Be Half of Forecast
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Alex Webb\u0010Technology Reporter \u0010Bloomberg News \u0010Discussing that initial shipments of Apple Inc.’s new iPhone X will total 20 million units this year, Japanese news service Nikkei reported
